data.text:
@jessie___m Hi @jessie___m, yes we have an online chat here: https://t.co/fxd6BsEJUx Choose the category "Chat with Customer Service" and Turi, our chat bot, will connect you to a live agent when one is available.
Kind regards, Mikael.

@dmnicholson Hi @dmnicholson, I am sorry to hear your bag is delayed, but I can't check the status in my system. You can track your bag here: https://t.co/2zwsPbhQFU or call baggage service here: https://t.co/ZV9bTO3uo2
Kind regards, Mikael.

@travelorbust79 Hi @travelorbust79, the chat robot can't assist you with this, you need to choose the category: "Chat with Customer Service" so a live agent can help you check the available options for you.
Kind regards, Mikael.

@TV2Taule Hej @TV2Taule, om du är på din destination och fått din hemresa inställd utan något nytt resealternativ, ring 0046 8 797 4100 så kommer vi att göra vårt yttersta för att hjälpa dig.
Vänlig hälsning, Mikael.

urls.title: Delayed, Lost and Damaged Baggage
urls.description: We transport your baggage with care. But if your baggage has been delayed, lost or damaged for some reason, here you can find helpful information »

data.text:
@Ldevaney27 Hi @Ldevaney27, I'm sorry to hear your bag is delayed. Many airports report major baggage delivery delays due to shortage of staff this summer. You can read more about delayed baggage and how to proceed here https://t.co/yaDBpcxdM2
Kind regards, Mikael.

urls.title: Canceled or Delayed Flight
urls.description: If your flight was delayed or canceled because of us, you may be entitled to compensation. If you’re entitled to compensation, we will compensate you in accordance with the EU261 regulation.

data.text:
@ChiRN87 Hi! 

Please contact our customer service by phone or live chat so we can help you have a closer look at your refund. You can find our contact information here: https://t.co/O6Jy9vqnvM

Kind regards,
Dennis

@TTarahealy Hi! 

I apologize if you were misinformed but where did you send that email? I recommend that you contact our live chat so we can help you have a closer look at it.

Kind regards,
Dennis.

data.text:
@roberts_malin Hello! We are truly sorry for the inconvenience! If you wish to apply for a compensation for the irregularity that occured with your booking, you can do so through our 
claim form here: https://t.co/oKlCwpaMq8 

Warm regards,
Jenny

data.text:
@randsborg Hej!
Jag rekommenderar er att kontakta oss via telefon eller genom vår Live chatt för att få vidare assistans gällande denna kansellering av er resa.
Ni finner våra kontaktuppgifter här: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj

Bästa hälsningar, Angelica

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@HmellisaM Hi, I am glad to hear you received your baggage yesterday!
I would recommend you to contact us by phone our using our Live chat to look further into your reservation regarding this cancellation.
You find our contact details here: https://t.co/b3QIqPkF0R

Best regards, Angelica

@maddie_a14 Hi!
Once you have reported your bag missing, the tracing will immediately start. You can follow the tracing here: https://t.co/2zwsPbhQFU
When the bag has been located, you will be informed about delivery.
You reach bag service here: https://t.co/We1FdD7ZiM
Best regards, Angelica

data.text:
@KatelynKing92 Hi @KatelynKing92, I'm sorry to hear that but we can't check the status of your delayed luggage. Please contact the arrival service at the airport where you landed so they can look into it. You can read more about delayed luggage here https://t.co/yaDBpcxdM2
Best regards, Mikael.

data.text:
@annaiko Hi!
I recommend you to contact us by Phone or Live Chat to receive further assistance regarding this cancellation of your ticket.
You find our contact information through this link: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj

Best regards, Angelica

@JEMehalick Hi @JEMehalick,
yes, this flight is supposed to operate! Kind Regards, Anna

@damiandugdale Hi,
We do not know how long the strike will last, but check your flight documents to see who operates the flight. If it is is operated by SAS Link, Connect or another airline, it will not be cancelled due to the strike. Kind Regards, Anna

urls.title: Canceled flights
urls.description: In the event of your flight being canceled, we will do our best to take care of you and keep you informed. More about what your rights are »

data.text:
@sarahskarum Hi,
I'm sorry for the late reply and that you are affected by a cancelled flight! Please find all relevant information about how you request compensation for your expenses:
https://t.co/rFWuWj4zpW
Kind Regards, Anna

@BshlsOBadHabits Hi @BshlsOBadHabits, we can't send a boarding pass via mail. So if you can't download it yourself, it's possible to arrange at the airport.
Best regards, Mikael.

urls.title: Customer Feedback

data.text:

you can arrange that by using this form https://t.co/oU8rKDLo5O

Best regards, Mikael

urls.title: Customer Claims
urls.description: If you’re filing a claim due to an unfortunate experience with us, you may be entitled to compensation.

data.text:
@Fit4life0628 Hi, if you booked a seat that you did not get, you can submit a case for a refund to our Customer Care via this link https://t.co/xMt9zSrqJc
//Henrik

@INGRIDLCN Hi, I recommend that you contact us by phone or chat with the booking reference so that we can look further into this
//Henrik

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text:
@Grantfiero Hi, we can not see the status of delayed luggage via twitter. You need to contact the baggage service at the airport, which was your final destination. You will find the numbers at this link https://t.co/We1FdD7ZiM
//Henrik

urls.title: Today's top frequent flyer deals | SAS
urls.description: Discover the world with special offers and discounts from EuroBonus & Partners. Get an overview of all our time limited member offers in one place »

data.text:
@idajunkie Hi. We have no update on whether it will be the same this year. If it will be offered, the update will come to this link https://t.co/z8g4WpiWk2
//Henrik

@GScherrenburg Hi. We have now sent a reminder of this matter to our Customer Care department. We also recommend that you remove sensitive information such as the booking reference and case number from social posts
//Henrik

urls.title: Contact forms
urls.description: Report a Login issue. If you' re having trouble logging in or with your password, please contact SAS Customer

data.text:
@imogenrosewalsh Hi, we are sorry this experience was not pleasant. At this link you will find our contact forms depending on what your case is about https://t.co/cXegpq56aG
//Henrik

@eeengstrand Hej, när du bokar en tur och retur resa så är det endast en biljett för en person. Därför kan du inte ha ett namn på utresan och ha ett annat på returen. 
//Henrik

@SeaSpitfires Hi, You can bring glassware with you in your carry on luggage. We recommend that you pack fragile items there
//Henrik
@murci3lag0 Hi, If your luggage is delayed, you need to contact the luggage service at the airport which was your final destination. The number for Oslo is +47 64812700

@AnilKariwala Hi, If your luggage is delayed, you need to contact the luggage service at the airport which was your final destination for information. You can find the telephone numbers via this link https://t.co/We1FdD7ZiM
//Henrik

data.text:
@traiimp Hello! As the booking reference (PNR) is personal we highly recommend deleting the tweets containing it. If you're having trouble checking in we recommend clearing cache and cookies.
Kind regards, Alicia.

@traiimp Hey, I'm sorry fore late answer. If you can't check in online you must check in at the airport.   I  recommend that you delete the booking ref so that unauthorized persons cannot access your information . Best Regard Phonnicha

@stevekovo Hi Steve,
I'd advice you make sure you're making your reservation in a currency that's corresponding to the voucher and try another browser.
If the issue persists please give us a call and we will gladly help you make your reservation: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Best Reg., Rebecca

data.text:
@MadsDahlLarsen Hej Mads
Om din väska inte har återfunnits efter 21 dagar kan du lämna in en begäran om ersättning för förlorat bagage. Du gör detta via customer care: https://t.co/cXegpq56aG 

Har du reseförsäkring så är det en god idé att undersöka detta alternativ först.

Hälsningar, Anja!

urls.title: EU Passenger Rights
urls.description: Regulations regarding passenger rights in case of any delays, canceled flights and/or denied boarding. If your flight has been canceled or significantly delayed or if you have been denied boarding on a flight for which you have a confirmed reservation, you are entitled to the rights defined in Regulation (EC) No 261/2004, which entered into force on 17/02/2005. The airline on whose flight the disruption occurs is responsible for granting your rights. Visit eur-lex.europa.eu for more about EU 261/2004

data.text:
@drybrarian Hello
You can read about your rights as a customer in the event of delays here: https://t.co/PYD5U9Cahy

If you are entitled to compensation, you are welcome to contact our customer care department, you can reach them via this link: https://t.co/cXegppNuM6

Kind regards Anja!

data.text:
@rajeevmahatma Hello! We are truly sorry for the inconvenience! For assist with your lost luggage, please contact our baggage department 
in Amsterdam on number +31 20 795 27 00 or visit the airport for easier handling.

Kind regards,
Jenny

@pulvardon Hello! We are truly sorry for the inconvenience! For assist with your lost luggage, please contact our baggage department 
in London on number +44 344 3754250 or visit the airport for easier handling.

Kind regards,
Jenny
